title: Bed
description: A bed made from sapele, with pine slats. Finished with danish oil.

images.description: The basic frame made from sapele, the slat supports on the sides are a 2x4 ripped in half.
The legs each have a taper on both outside faces and chamfers at the top. The rails also meet the legs with a chamfer.
Dowels and zipbolt connectors were used to join the rails to the legs. The dowels are only glued into the rails so the whole frame can be dismantled flat.
A simple 2x4 adds extra support for the slats in the centre.
This centre support is joined to the rails using pocket holes.
The slats are screwed into the supports on either side.
The fit for a king size mattress came out great, it's not too tight that it's hard to drop in but it doesn't move about either.
